title: List Milestones
description: Detailed information about a list of milestones in a GitHub repository, including their repository, URL, HTML URL, labels URL, ID, node ID, number, state, title, description, creator, open issues, closed issues, creation timestamp, update timestamp, closed timestamp, and due timestamp.

repository.description: The full name or identifier of the repository containing the milestone

url.description: The API endpoint URL for retrieving details about this specific milestone

html_url.description: The web URL where the milestone can be viewed in a browser

labels_url.description: The API endpoint URL for retrieving labels associated with this milestone

id.description: The system-generated unique identifier for the milestone

node_id.description: The globally unique identifier for the milestone in the GitHub GraphQL API

number.description: The repository-specific sequential number assigned to the milestone

state.description: The current status of the milestone, typically 'open' or 'closed'

title.description: The name or brief summary of the milestone's purpose

description.description: An optional detailed explanation of the milestone's goals or contents

creator.description: Detailed information about the GitHub user who created the milestone

open_issues.description: The count of issues currently open and associated with this milestone

closed_issues.description: The count of issues that have been closed and associated with this milestone

created_at.description: The ISO 8601 format timestamp indicating when the milestone was initially created

updated_at.description: The ISO 8601 format timestamp indicating when the milestone was last modified

closed_at.description: The ISO 8601 format timestamp indicating when the milestone was marked as closed, if applicable

due_on.description: The ISO 8601 format timestamp indicating the target completion date for the milestone, if set
